mapper.select: select * from d_bussiness_card where (name like '%${text}%') or (nickname like '%${text}%') or (company_name like '%${text}%') or (cellphone_number like '%${text}%') or (b_bussiness_card_category_guid = #{categoryGuid}) or (b_bussiness_card_status_guid = #{statusGuid}) or (b_bussiness_card_attribute_guid = #{attributeGuid}) limit #{offset}, #{limit};
